column1: Friends may call at the Urbanski Funeral Home A Life Celebration Home
column2: 5055 Secor Road (north of Laskey) Friday June 19
column3: 2015 from 4 until 8 p.m. Additional visitation will take place on Saturday
column5: 2015 from 9 until 10 a.m. at St. Adalbert Catholic Church with the Funeral Mass beginning at 10 a.m. Interment will follow in Toledo Memorial Park.
